Name: City of Stirling, Stirling History Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-5pm; closed public holidays. General reference assistance available. No copying services available.

About.Access: One day's advance notice of visit required. Proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: Items relevant to City of Stirling only, including some council reports. Early material housed in JS Battye Library.

About.Major holdings:
Various: Photographs 1900-1970 (1m).
	City of Stirling: Reports 1980- (14m).
	Local Studies Collection

Contact.Street address: Administration Centre 25 Cedric Street, Stirling WA 6021
